channelDescription:
Satvic Movement is a community-driven health revolution to help you reach the peak of your physical, mental, and spiritual well-being.

The Satvic lifestyle is rooted in principles of simple food, early waking, yoga, loving relationships, service attitude and living in harmony with nature.

The knowledge shared is based on timeless ancient principles and is communicated in modern, practical and easy-to-understand terms. 

It is shared through our online workshops (ranging from 3 to 21 days), books and videos.

So far, over 5 lakh people have attended our workshops, 100,000 Satvic books have been sold, and our videos have amassed over 1 billion views.

Founded in 2017, today, Satvic Movement has exploded into a thriving community of thousands of people across India, becoming one of the largest health revolutions in the nation.

Satvic Movement's mission is to create a world where people can effortlessly live a healthy and joyful life, in harmony with each other, and with Mother Nature.

comments: Dear Radhika M'am and Satvik team, probably you are not aware how many individuals and how much of a difference you are making to each one of our life! So much gratitude from all of us 🙏
"अगर ख्वाईश कुछ अलग करने की है तो दिल और दिमाग के बीच बगावत लाजमी है I"🙏
I'm a jee aspirant my exam is in 100 days. I was dying with anxiety ,I was sleeping too much but still tired. This 15 mins video was more energizing than my whole night's sleep
Hare Krishna ❤ wonderful maam thank you so much isse buhut relax milta h
This is magical.Felt so good can't express in words. Thank you so much Radhika mam and satvic movement.God bless you❤🥺
